Questions.QuestionText:
This is a prototype of a tool to facilitate digital maturity assessment on IT Management and Governance.
It is based on a Dev-Ops maturity assessment tool. You cant find out more about it under about .
Its KPIs are simplicity and efficiency, to provide a first sight assessment to our clients regarding their maturity on Governance IT.
Does a process to ensure Governance Framework Setting and Maintenance exist?
Is there a process to ensure benefits delivery?
Is there a process to Ensure Risk Optimisation?
Is there a process to Ensure Resource Optimisation?
Is there a process to manage the IT Management Framework?
Is there a process to manage Enterprise Architecture?
Is there a process to Manage Innovation?
Is there a process to Manage Budget and Costs?
Is there a process to Manage Costumer Relationsships?
Is there a process to Manage Service Agreements?
Is there a process to Manage Suppliers?
Is there a process to Manage & audit quality?
Is there a process to Manage Risk?
Is there a process to manage security?
Is there a process to manage Programmes and Projects?
Is there a process to manage Operations?
Is there a process to monitor, evaluate and assess Performance and Conformance?
Does your organization have knowledge about its current structure?
Which model fits the structure of your organization best?
Is a financial management included in the Service strategy?
Is a demand management included in the Service strategy?
Is the service portfolio regulary assessed and updated?
Is service continuity implemented into the service design process?
Is availability management included in the service design?
Is capacity management included in the service design?
Are all service levels included in the service design?
Are suppliers & information security equally included in the service design?
Are Service Assess- & Configuration mangement included in service transition?
Does release- & deployment management exist for the service transition?
Is change management a measurable part of the service transition?
Does transition planning & support exist?
Is a service desk implemented to support service operation?
Does Incident Management exist to ensure resilience of the service operation?
Does Problem Management exist to support efficiency of service operation?
